title: PDF Adverse Reaction Extraction Results
description: Schema for validating PDF adverse reaction extraction results

successful.description: Array of successfully processed PDF files

filename.description: Name of the PDF file processed

controlled_trial_text.description: Direct quote of text related to adverse reactions from controlled trials/studies

symptoms_list.description: List of specific symptoms/adverse reactions mentioned

study_type.description: Type of controlled study (e.g., 'randomized controlled trial', 'clinical trial', 'solicited adverse events')

source_section.description: Section name where this information was found (e.g., 'Clinical Trials Experience', 'Solicited Adverse Reactions')

full_pdf_text.description: Complete text extracted from the PDF document

raw_response.description: Raw JSON response from the LLM API

failed.description: Array of failed PDF processing attempts

filename.description: Name of the PDF file that failed to process

raw_response.description: Raw response from the LLM API, if available
